TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityModelBuildProvider extends System.Web.Compilation.BuildProvider

Docs.summary: Represents the CSDL build provider for the ASP.NET build environment.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void GenerateCode(class System.Web.Compilation.AssemblyBuilder assemblyBuilder) cil managed

Docs.param: The assembly builder that references the source code generated by the build provider.
Docs.summary: Generates source code for the entity model build provider, and adds the source code to a specified assembly builder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The GenerateCode method embeds the CSDL file as a resource in the dynamically compiled assembly and also generates classes from CSDL file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Web.Compilation.BuildProviderResultFlags GetResultFlags(class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults results) cil managed

Docs.param: The compilation results for the build provider.
Docs.summary: Returns a value indicating actions required when a entity model build provider is built.
Docs.returns: The value, which indicates that the containing will be unloaded and restarted.
